Method Detail

findFieldHandler

public FieldHandler findFieldHandler(FieldContext fieldContext)
Looks up a field handler based on the information provided in the field context. The lookup logic is implemented like this:
  1. If the assignment type is AssignmentType.ID return IdFieldHandler
  2. if the assignment type is AssignmentType.IDREF return IdRefFieldHandler
  3. if the fields type is a primitive return the ConverterFieldHandler
  4. if the fields type is an enum return EnumFieldHandler
  5. If the fields type is an array return ArrayFieldHandler
  6. Try to lookup the field handler by the fields type classname (this will resolve all types registered in registerInitialFieldHandlers()
  7. If no field handler return XmlRegistryFieldHandler.

Specified by:
findFieldHandler in interface FieldHandlerRegistry
Parameters:
fieldContext -
Returns:
See Also:
